posts.post_title: I have an Old Mill in a PSA 2.5
posts.post_content: The front is a beauty looks like a 4.5 minimally no creases , the back has about 1/3 the size paper loss of your baby fingernail. I dont want to sell it, if I do around 8k, it is too nice and to replace the overall look would cost me about 12k...
